question: Find out the correct location of McMurdo Dry Valleys the hyper saline water bodies on dry land?
explanation: In Antarctica, lakes in the McMurdo Dry Valleys are hypersaline. They are such as Lake Vanda with salinity of over 35% (i.e. 10 times as salty as ocean water). The most saline water body in the world is the Gaet'ale Pond, located in the Danakil Depression in Afar, Ethiopia.
